author: wn.com
title: Criminals should hand over licence if given bail - Higgins (Irish Labour Party)
text: ( Source : Irish Labour Party ) 8 October 2015 Statement by Senator Lorraine Higgins Reform & Foreign Affairs Labour Senator Lorraine Higgins today said that criminals should be made to hand over their driving licence if given bail whilst
